review: Could be my internet speed but it freezes up.  You have to reload about every five minutes.  I don't have this problem with my Roku. UPDATE: Increased internet speed and we have no problems.  Amazon is always willing to help out and that is an added bonus.  P.S. I love the installed screen savers- almost rather sit and watch those.

review: So far, so good. It's got a nice, slick interface. It streams media quickly and well. It's pretty much exactly what I was hoping for. We have 4 Roku's including a Roku 3. I will probably replace the Roku's with these little Fire things whenever the Roku's die. Hard to go wrong with these.
